entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Frances
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:31 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Frances 8:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -24.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -27.3°C
Wind: WSW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
